item.title: Iran protests: 646 killed, activists say, as Trump weighs military action
item.description: The death toll over 16 days of mass anti-government protests in Iran reached 646 as of Monday, according to data published by the the U.S.-based HRANA...

item.title: WATCH: Video shows paraglider's terrifying plunge off Florida coast
item.description: Video shows the terrifying moment a paraglider took a 500-foot fall, splash-landing into the water off the Florida coast.

item.title: People inside Iran describe heavy security in first calls to outside world
item.description: Iranians could call abroad on mobile phones for the first time since communications were halted during a crackdown on protests in which activists say ...

item.title: Mamdani 'outraged' after New York City Council employee detained by ICE
item.description: A New York City Council employee was detained during a "routine" immigration appointment on Long Island on Monday, according to city officials.

item.title: WATCH: Police: Dense fog causes deadly 17 car pileup in Fresno, California
item.description: First responders pulled dozens from cars after police say that dense fog caused a deadly pileup crash on Highway 99 in Fresno, California.
